channel.title: backup on Yet another one DevOps blog
channel.description: Recent content in backup on Yet another one DevOps blog

item.title: Backup gem and Chef
item.description: Intro There’s a nice tool for doing fast and easy backup to AWS S3: backup gem There should be done a lot of steps for setup a backup though. So it could be automated with chef. In this article I’ll write log of creation backup gem’s cookbook. Essentially this cookbook will install backup gem, that will backup /var/www folder to AWS S3 every day in 01:00. It will store last 14 backups.
